product_name: Repel Sportsmen Insect Repellent Wipes - 30 Percent DEET - Package of 15
long_description: The convenient Repel Sportsmen Formula(R) insect repellent wipes let you easily shield yourself from biting insects. Formula is 30% DEET for up to 10 hrs. of effective protection. Great for use against mosquitoes, ticks, biting flies, gnats, chiggers and fleas. Airtight dispenser conveniently stores in your glove box or small fanny pack; contains fifteen 8.5 x 5 in. wipes. Repel Sportsmen Formula insect repellent wipes allow you to reach inconvenient areas such as the back of your legs and neck.
short_description: The convenient Repel Sportsmen Formula(R) insect repellent wipes let you easily shield yourself from biting insects.
